mapper.insert: insert into material_nutrition (id, material_id, material_type_id, quality, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quality,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update material_nutrition set material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_type_id = #{materialTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, quality = #{quality,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, material_id, material_type_id, quality, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at from material_nutrition
